name: VcareAll Solution Pvt. Ltd.
description:
▣ VcareAll is a technology firm that specializes in building web applications, mobile apps, platforms and IOT solutions for startups and mid-size companies.
▣ Our mission is to help startups and enterprises bring their ideas to life.
▣ Our processes are driven by a proven MVP Development Framework and powered by passionate people who are committed to delivery and excellence.
✔ 8+ Years of development experience in:
► WebApps using PHP-Laravel based frameworks
► IOS/Android Mobile Apps - Native | Hybrid | Progressive Web Mobile Apps
► Web Design and Development
◈ Working with best development models & well-defined process. ◈ UI/UX designs as per Industry Standards. ◈ Pixel perfect design implementation. ◈ Cross Browser/Device compatibility. ◈ Encryption technologies & secured web service communication. ◈ Ensuring optimum utilization of memory & battery. ◈ Extensive testing & QA.
